definition.de: Organisationen, die jenen Hilfe anbieten, die Mangel an Nahrungsmitteln, Wasser oder Unterkunft haben
definition.dk: Organisationer, der sigter mod at hjælpe mennesker uden mad, vand og ly i pludselige nødsituationer.
definition.en-GB: The planning and efforts made by people and organizations to help victims of a sudden, unplanned event, natural disaster or crisis
definition.en-US: The planning and efforts made by people and organizations to help victims of a sudden, unplanned event, natural disaster or crisis
definition.pt-BR: Organizações criadas para fornecer ajuda a quem tem falta de comida, água ou abrigo.
definition.pt-PT: Organizações criadas para fornecer ajuda a quem tem falta de comida, água ou abrigo.
definition.se: Organisationer som har som syfte att hjälpa personer utan hem, mat och vatten vid plötsligt uppkomna krissituationer.
definition.zh-Hans: 为那些因缺乏食物、水或住所的人们提供帮助而设立的组织机构。为帮助突发、意外事件、自然灾害或危机的受害者而进行的计划和努力
